tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE targets (
    target_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    age INT,
    location VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE behaviors (
    behavior_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    target_id INT REFERENCES targets(target_id),
    behavior_type VARCHAR(50),
    behavior_description TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE social_engineering_campaigns (
    campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    target_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (target_id) REFERENCES behavior_patterns(target_id)
);

CREATE TABLE target_profiles (
    target_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    phone_number VARCHAR(20),
    birthday DATE,
    last_login TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE campaign_activity (
    activity_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    target_id UUID,
    campaign_id UUID,
    activity_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    activity_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE targets (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
    phone_number VARCHAR(20),
    location VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE behaviors (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    target_id INTEGER REFERENCES targets(id),
    behavior_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    behavior_description TEXT,
    behavior_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE messages (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    sender_id INTEGER REFERENCES targets(id),
    receiver_id INTEGER REFERENCES targets(id),
    message_text TEXT,
    message_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE campaigns (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    start_date TIMESTAMP,
    end_date TIMESTAMP,
    target_id INTEGER REFERENCES targets(id)
);
